{{Description|This was a temporary abode established outside the [[Vourukasha Oasis|sea of flowers]] by the [[Order of Skeptics|guardian priests]] of the true way in ancient times. Returning warriors and [[Fontaine|foreign]] [[Oceanid|pilgrims]] would fast and bathe here to cleanse themselves of impurity.<br>This is said to have been because only the pure and innocent were eligible to enter the temple of the [[Lord of Amrita]].|Sanctuary of Solemnity}}
'''Purification Spring''' is a [[One-Time Domain]] located in the [[Hills of Barsom]], [[Realm of Farakhkert]], [[Girdle of the Sands]], [[Sumeru]]. It contains one level, '''Sanctuary of Solemnity'''.
